uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.http

Interface HttpService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AppContextCleanup, AppContextService<HttpService>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHttpService

    public interface HttpService
extends AppContextService<HttpService>
    A simple AppContextService to handle http client operaitons This is implemented as a service to allow substitution for mock testing.
